outputs.name: mat
outputs.description:
A standard solid material that can be assigned to a Fairyfly Shape
to change the properties of the material in a THERM simulation.

inputs.name: _name_
inputs.description: Text to set the name for the material.

inputs.name: _conductivity
inputs.description: Number for the thermal conductivity of the material [W/m-K].

inputs.name: _emissivity_
inputs.description:
Number between 0 and 1 for the infrared hemispherical
emissivity of the material. (Default: 0.9).

inputs.name: density_
inputs.description: Number for the density of the material [kg/m3].

inputs.name: porosity_
inputs.description: Optional number between 0 and 1 for the porosity of the material.

inputs.name: spec_heat_
inputs.description: Number for the specific heat of the material [J/kg-K].

inputs.name: vapor_resist_
inputs.description: Optional number for the water vapor diffusion resistance factor.

inputs.name: rgb_color_
inputs.description:
An optional color to set the color of the material when it is
imported to THERM. If unspecified, a randomly-generated color is assigned.

code:
import uuid

try:  # import the core ladybug dependencies
    from ladybug.color import Color
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import the fairyfly-therm dependencies
    from fairyfly_therm.material.solid import SolidMaterial
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import fairyfly_therm:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    # set the default material properties
    _emissivity_ = 0.9 if _emissivity_ is None else _emissivity_

    # create the material
    mat = SolidMaterial(
        _conductivity, _emissivity_, None,
        density_, porosity_, spec_heat_, vapor_resist_
    )
    mat.display_name = _name_ if _name_ is not None else \
        'Solid Material {}'.format(str(uuid.uuid4())[:8])
    if rgb_color_ is not None:
        mat.color = Color(rgb_color_.R, rgb_color_.G, rgb_color_.B)
